description:
It was discovered that openpyxl incorrectly handled certain documents. A
remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service
or other unspecified impact.

openpyxl.description: Python library to read/write Excel 2010 xlsx/xlsm/xltx/xltm files

title: openpyxl vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
openpyxl could be made to crash if it opened a specially crafted
file.
